'''Chasca''' is a playable {{Anemo}} character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

The most infamous Peacemaker of the [[Flower-Feather Clan]] and no stranger to the [[Night Warden Wars]], Chasca bears the [[Ancient Name]] of {{Ancient Name|VK|'''Vuka'''|bearer=1}}. She is familiar with conflicts &mdash; at times struggling with many of her own internal ones &mdash; yet despite how many would view her, she is always able to stand above them.
